title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 88.5 - Inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 88.5 - Inspection

State Regulations

The books and records required by section
88.4
of this Part shall be
maintained for a period of at least two years and shall be available for
inspection by any authorized representative of the authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
88.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
